member.summary: Returns true if the attachment is a variant of an original attachment.

member.summary: Filters attachments to get only ones which do not represent variants.

member.summary: Gets attachment variants for given set of parent attachments.

member.summary: Returns that represents variant of the given attachment. The variant is specified by parameter.
member.exception: Thrown when either of the parameters are null.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.AttachmentExtensions.GenerateVariant(CMS.DocumentEngine.AttachmentInfo,CMS.ResponsiveImages.IVariantContext,System.String)
member.summary: Generates single image variant for given attachment. The variant is specified by parameter.
member.remarks: Deletes an existing variant if the given variant definition is no longer applicable on the attachment.
member.returns: Generated image variant from the main attachment or null if variant did not generate.
member.exception: Thrown when either of the parameters are null.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.AttachmentExtensions.GenerateAllVariants(CMS.DocumentEngine.AttachmentInfo,CMS.ResponsiveImages.IVariantContext)
member.summary: Generates all image variants for given attachment overwriting existing variants.
member.remarks: Only applicable variants will be generated. Variant definitions which are no more applicable to the attachment will be deleted.

member.summary: Generates attachment image variants which were not yet generated.

member.summary: Sets the attachment variant generator.

member.summary: Returns the search content of the attachment (including names, title, description and extracted content of the attachment binary data) which should be included to the content field of the SearchDocument. member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.Internal.AlternativeUrlHelper.NormalizeAlternativeUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Ensures correct format of the .

remarks.para:
Following rules are applied
Leading/trailing whitespace characters are trimmed.
Leading tilde with slash or leading slash is removed.
Multiple slashes are replaced by single slash.
Trailing slash is removed.
Query string and anchor is removed.
Value is decoded.

member.param: Url in string to be normalized.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.Internal.AlternativeUrlHelper.IsUrlPatternSuspect(CMS.DataEngine.DataClassInfo,System.String[],System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{CMS.DataEngine.ColumnDefinition})
member.summary: Checks whether 's URL pattern might be resolved to an alternative URL composed of . Returns a to be used for a to locate documents that might be in conflict with alternative URL. Returns null, if the 's URL pattern will not be in conflict with alternative URL.

example.para: URL pattern contains a constant part e.g. /Articles/{%NodeGuid%} and alternative URL is like /News/Example then we do not need to check pages of that page type.
{%NodeName%}/{%DocumentName%}/News might be a suspect when alternative URL is /Awesome/Fresh/News.

{%NodeId%}/{%NodeGuid%}/News cannot be a suspect when alternative URL is /Awesome/Fresh/News, because 'Awesome' cannot be converted to int supposed that {%NodeId%} macro is backed by integer type. {%NodeGuid%} is also incompatible with 'Fresh'.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.Internal.PreviewLinkGenerator.GeneratePreviewModeUrl(System.Guid,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Generates preview mode URL for the specified page and user.
member.param: User GUID to be stored in the preview link URL. If left empty, the user name is not stored in the generated URL.
Indicates if read-only mode should be enabled to disallow modify actions and POST requests.
Indicates if page is embedded in administration inside an iframe.
Culture code for which the preview link should be generated.
member.remarks: Preview mode is used for the page builder and the preview tab.

members.member:
Generates preview link URL for specified page and user.
User GUID to be stored in the preview link URL. If left empty, the user name is not stored in the generated URL. Optional additional query string parameters. Culture code for which the preview link should be generated. The can differ from the page culture in case of combine with default culture feature.
Preview link URL can be used by external users. This URL does not need additional authentization.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.DocumentQueryBase`2.GetEnumerableResult(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of data records representing the result of this query. If has set to true, the resulting data records are filtered based on permissions.
member.param: Command behavior for the underlying reader.
If true, the underlying reader will be executed using its own dedicated connection.
member.returns: Returns the enumeration resulting from query execution.
member.exception: Thrown when the query does not support reader.

remarks.para: The returned data records can contain additional system columns ( and ) when a paged query is being executed. The columns support the framework infrastructure and should not be relied on in custom code.
The data records do not reflect version data. The version data are applied as part of the method.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.DocumentQueryBase`2.GetEnumerableResultAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Asynchronously gets an enumeration of data records representing the result of this query. If has set to true, the resulting data records are filtered based on permissions.
member.param: Command behavior for the underlying reader.
If true, the underlying reader will be executed using its own dedicated connection.
member.returns: Returns a task returning the enumeration resulting from query execution.

remarks.para: The returned data records can contain additional system columns ( and ) when a paged query is being executed. The columns support the framework infrastructure and should not be relied on in custom code.
The data records do not reflect version data. The version data are applied as part of the method

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.DocumentQueryBase`2.Culture(System.String[])
member.summary: Filters the data to include only documents translated to given culture(s).

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.DocumentQueryBase`2.CombineWithDefaultCulture(System.Boolean)
member.summary: The data will be combined with documents in site default culture if not translated to the requested one(s). When several cultures are required, the order is taken in account as a priority for documents with several matching language versions.
member.param: If true, documents will be combined with default culture, otherwise only documents translated to one of the requested culture(s) are retrieved

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.DocumentQueryBase`2.CombineWithAnyCulture(System.Boolean)
member.summary: The data will be combined with documents in any culture if not translated to the requested one(s). When several cultures are required, the order is taken in account as a priority for documents with several matching language versions followed by any other language version. If no culture specified, the highest priority has site preferred culture, second the default culture followed by the rest of site cultures.
member.param: If true, documents will be combined with any other culture(s), otherwise only documents translated to one of the requested culture(s) are retrieved

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.DocumentQueryBase`2.AllCultures(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ensures that all culture versions of the documents are retrieved.
member.param: If true, all culture versions are retrieved, otherwise documents of specified culture(s) are retrieved

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.MultiDocumentQueryBase`3.GetEnumerableResult(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of data records representing the result of this query. If has set to true, the resulting data records are filtered based on permissions.
member.param: Command behavior for the underlying reader.
If true, the underlying reader will be executed using its own dedicated connection.
member.returns: Returns the enumeration resulting from query execution.
member.exception: Thrown when the query does not support reader.

remarks.para: The returned data records can contain additional system columns ( and ) when a paged query is being executed. The columns support the framework infrastructure and should not be relied on in custom code.
The data records do not reflect version data. To apply version data to the resulting enumeration, the method must be used.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.MultiDocumentQueryBase`3.GetEnumerableResultAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Asynchronously gets an enumeration of data records representing the result of this query. If has set to true, the resulting data records are filtered based on permissions.
member.param: Command behavior for the underlying reader.
If true, the underlying reader will be executed using its own dedicated connection.
member.returns: Returns a task returning the enumeration resulting from query execution.
member.exception: Thrown when the query does not support reader.
member.para: The returned data records can contain additional system columns ( and ) when a paged query is being executed. The columns support the framework infrastructure and should not be relied on in custom code.
The data records do not reflect version data. To apply version data to the resulting enumeration, the method must be used.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.MultiDocumentQueryBase`3.CombineWithDefaultCulture(System.Boolean)
member.summary: The data will be combined with documents in site default culture if not translated to the requested one(s). When several cultures are required, the order is taken in account as a priority for documents with several matching language versions.
member.param: If true, documents will be combined with default culture, otherwise only documents translated to one of the requested culture(s) are retrieved

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.MultiDocumentQueryBase`3.CombineWithAnyCulture(System.Boolean)
member.summary: The data will be combined with documents in any culture if not translated to the requested one(s). When several cultures are required, the order is taken in account as a priority for documents with several matching language versions followed by any other language version. If no culture specified, the highest priority has site preferred culture, second the default culture followed by the rest of site cultures.
member.param: If true, documents will be combined with any other culture(s), otherwise only documents translated to one of the requested culture(s) are retrieved

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.MultiDocumentQueryBase`3.AllCultures(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ensures that all culture versions of the documents are retrieved.
member.param: If true, all culture versions are retrieved, otherwise documents of specified culture(s) are retrieved

member.summary: Filters the documents to include only records on the given site.
member.param: If true, includes the global objects in case the object type covers both site and global objects

member.summary: Encapsulates extension method for objects.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.TaxonomyDocumentQueryExtensions.WithTag``2(CMS.DocumentEngine.IDocumentQuery{``0,``1},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves only pages which are assigned to the given . Omitting parameter causes the selection of the tag across all tag groups.

remarks.para: Multiple tags can have the same name when assigned to a different tag group. Omitting parameter causes the selection of the tag across all tag groups.

Note: This method is a data filter and can be used directly only to modify the DocumentQuery (e.g. DocumentHelper.GetDocuments().WithTag("Tag_A")). It cannot be used as a part of where condition (e.g. DocumentHelper.GetDocuments().WhereContains("DocumentName", "Article").Or().WithTag("Tag_A")).

member.typeparam: Actual type of query being extended.
Actual type of TreeNode instance.
member.param: Document Query which is being extended.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.TaxonomyDocumentQueryExtensions.InCategories``2(CMS.DocumentEngine.IDocumentQuery{``0,``1},System.String[])
member.summary: Retrieves all pages which belong to any of the specified categories.

remarks.para: If the query is parameterized with method the searches site categories first. When no site categories are found it falls back on global categories search.

Note: This method is a data filter and can be used directly only to modify the DocumentQuery (e.g. DocumentHelper.GetDocuments().InCategories("Category_A")). It cannot be used as a part of where condition (e.g. DocumentHelper.GetDocuments().WhereContains("DocumentName", "Article").Or().InCategories("Category_A")).

member.typeparam: Actual type of query being extended.
Actual type of TreeNode instance.
member.param: Document Query which is being extended.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.TaxonomyDocumentQueryExtensions.InEnabledCategories``2(CMS.DocumentEngine.IDocumentQuery{``0,``1},System.String[])
member.summary: Retrieves all pages which belong to any of the specified enabled categories.

remarks.para: If the query is parameterized with method the searches enabled site categories first. When no site categories are found it falls back on global categories search.

Note: This method is a data filter and can be used directly only to modify the DocumentQuery (e.g. DocumentHelper.GetDocuments().InEnabledCategories("Category_A")). It cannot be used as a part of where condition (e.g. DocumentHelper.GetDocuments().WhereContains("DocumentName", "Article").Or().InEnabledCategories("Category_A")).

member.typeparam: Actual type of query being extended.
Actual type of TreeNode instance.
member.param: Document Query which is being extended.

member.name: M:CMS.DocumentEngine.TaxonomyDocumentQueryExtensions.InCategories``2(CMS.DocumentEngine.IDocumentQuery{``0,``1},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves all pages which are in any of the specified categories.
member.typeparam: Actual type of query being extended.
Actual type of TreeNode instance.
member.param: Document Query which is being extended.
Indicates if only documents belonging to enabled (sub)categories are to be filtered out.
